definitions.definition: To cry out or shout in contempt .
To make a hoo , the cry of an owl.
To assail with contemptuous cries or shouts; to follow with derisive shouts.
examples: Mary felt extremely offended when the workers hooted at her.

definitions.definition: To sound the horn of a vehicle.
examples: When you arrive to pick me up, hoot , and I'll come outside.

main_definition: To cry out or shout in contempt .
secondary_definitions: To make a hoo , the cry of an owl.
To assail with contemptuous cries or shouts; to follow with derisive shouts.
To sound the horn of a vehicle.
